item.description:
A friend who lives in Hollis, NH, is opening her house up to us to watch a DVD - usually a foreign film or another critically acclaimed film - and also share something to eat.

I'll provide the address to those who RSVP.

Bring a snack to share.

Since there is only space for a limited number of people, please, only RSVP if you are sure you can attend, and, if you RSVP YES and things change for you, please change your RSVP to NO as soon as possible. Otherwise, someone who might want to attend might not be able to.

The film choice, as of this moment, is "Triplets of Belleville," although if this is not available we will substitute another film.

I am listing this with several meetup groups and friends of our host will also attend.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a name tag. (There won't be so many of us that you'll have a problem recognizing me.)
item.why: It should be a great film.
item.name: Four star film night
